H0.text: By which treaty of 1713 did Spain cede Gibraltar and Minorca to Great Britain. Treaty of Rastatt

H1.text: By which treaty of 1713 did Spain cede Gibraltar and Minorca to Great Britain. Treaty of Baden

H2.text: By which treaty of 1713 did Spain cede Gibraltar and Minorca to Great Britain. Treaty of Nijmegen

H3.text: By which treaty of 1713 did Spain cede Gibraltar and Minorca to Great Britain. Utrecht

A4.text: In Article X, Spain ceded the strategic ports of Gibraltar and Menorca.

A5.text: Britain established naval superiority over its competitors, commercial access to Spain and America, and control of Menorca and Gibraltar; it retains the latter territory to this day.
